name: GKInviteeResponse
desc: Possible responses from an invitation to a remote player.

items.name: static var inviteeResponseFailed: GKInviteRecipientResponse
items.desc: The invitation was unable to be delivered.

items.name: static var inviteeResponseIncompatible: GKInviteRecipientResponse
items.desc: The invitee isn’t running a compatible version of your game.

items.name: static var inviteeResponseNoAnswer: GKInviteRecipientResponse
items.desc: The invitation timed out without an answer.
